## IDeckOptions interface

Configuration for a deck.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IDeckOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [alwaysShowCount?](./bge-core.ideckoptions.alwaysshowcount.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, the deck count will always be displayed on top of the deck. |
|  [orientation?](./bge-core.ideckoptions.orientation.md) |  | [CardOrientation](./bge-core.cardorientation.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional default card orientation for the deck. |
